surveys.title: Happy with Facebook's User Experience?
surveys.description: Are you satisfied with the overall user experience provided by Facebook, including ease of navigation, accessibility, and feature richness?

surveys.title: Enjoying Google's Productivity Tools?
surveys.description: Do you enjoy using Google's suite of productivity tools, such as Gmail, Google Drive, and Google Calendar, for your personal or professional tasks?

surveys.title: LinkedIn Profile Completeness Satisfaction
surveys.description: How satisfied are you with the completeness and effectiveness of your LinkedIn profile in representing your professional identity and accomplishments?

surveys.title: Content Recommendation Satisfaction on Facebook
surveys.description: Do you find the content recommendations provided by Facebook relevant and engaging based on your interests and online activity?

surveys.title: Google Workplace Satisfaction Survey
surveys.description: How engaged and satisfied are you with the overall workplace environment and culture at Google, including collaboration, communication, and growth opportunities?

surveys.title: LinkedIn Learning Platform Feedback
surveys.description: Have you found the LinkedIn Learning platform effective and engaging in providing educational resources and skill development opportunities for professional growth?

surveys.title: Facebook Employee Well-being Assessment
surveys.description: How well does Facebook support the well-being and work-life balance of its employees, including benefits, support programs, and stress management initiatives?

surveys.title: Google Performance Review Satisfaction
surveys.description: Are you satisfied with the effectiveness and fairness of the performance review process at Google in providing constructive feedback and recognizing achievements?

surveys.title: Facebook Ads Effectiveness Evaluation
surveys.description: How effective do you find Facebook ads in reaching your target audience and achieving your marketing objectives, including brand awareness, lead generation, and conversions?

surveys.title: Google Trends Usage and Satisfaction
surveys.description: How often do you use Google Trends for market research and analysis, and how satisfied are you with its data accuracy, coverage, and visualization tools?

surveys.title: LinkedIn Audience Targeting Feedback
surveys.description: How successful have you been in targeting your desired audience on LinkedIn for marketing campaigns, and what improvements would you like to see in audience targeting features?

surveys.title: Facebook Market Insights Survey
surveys.description: How valuable do you find the market insights and analytics provided by Facebook for understanding consumer behavior, industry trends, and competitor analysis?
